    • closureProperty

      public GenProofStepStmt closureProperty(mmj.transforms.WorksheetInfo info, PropertyTemplate template, ParseNode node, boolean finishStatement, boolean searchWithPrefix)
      Creates closure rule applying generalized statement for the the node recursively. For example, suppose we have |- A e. CC. The this function for the input " _ e. CC" and "( sin ` A )" will find "|- A e. CC" and then will generate "|- ( sin ` A ) e. CC"
      Parameters:
      info - the work sheet info
      template - template (" _ e. CC" in the example)
      node - the input node ("( sin ` A )" in the example)
      finishStatement - true if the result statement is a target statement
      searchWithPrefix - true if we could search closure rules with implication prefix
      Returns:
      top-level closure statement ("|- ( sin ` A ) e. CC" in the example)

    • mergeSearchResults

      public static ClosureInfo.ClosureResult mergeSearchResults(ClosureInfo.ClosureResult preferred, ClosureInfo.ClosureResult other)
